name: ecs-deployer
description: CDK-based ECS deployment tool using CloudFormation templates

scripts.transform: aws cloudformation create-change-set --template-file cf/ecs-deployment-template.yaml --stack-name test-stack --parameter-overrides $(node bin/yaml-to-params.js values/simple-values.yaml) --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --change-set-name transform-output && aws cloudformation describe-change-set --stack-name test-stack --change-set-name transform-output --query 'TemplateBody' --output text > output/deployable.yaml
scripts.transform:example: aws cloudformation create-change-set --template-file cf/ecs-deployment-template.yaml --stack-name casscheduler-stack --parameter-overrides $(node bin/yaml-to-params.js values/casscheduler-values.yaml) --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --change-set-name transform-output && aws cloudformation describe-change-set --stack-name casscheduler-stack --change-set-name transform-output --query 'TemplateBody' --output text > output/casscheduler-deployable.yaml
